name: Larry the Wizard
description:
You're a wizard, Larry!

Even though Halgrim told you not to mix random ingredients in your cauldron, you did.

Now you are forced to fight endless waves of slimes who want to eat your "delicious" concoction until Halgrim is back.

Use your mighty wand to stop slimes from reaching the cauldron.

Blocking the windows with planks and using the mirrors to reflect your spells is advised.

Controls! Move! WASD
Shoot! LMB / Spacebar
Repair! RMB / E
Music! M
Full-screen!
F11 / Enter / Return
Quit! Escape
Slimes!

Green slime:

  • Common
  • Normal Speed
  • Weak

Red slime:

  • Common
  • Slower than usual
  • Stonk

Pink slime:

  • Rare
  • Pink go brrr
  • Weak

This game is Larry approved
